Reviews.Title: Excellent tablet, great tech support
Reviews.Author: Leonard Filla
Reviews.Content: Clarity, speed, and fantastic tech support. There are plenty of apps available. In fact, I am using it to learn Spanish via one of the free apps.

Reviews.Title: Bought this for my parents for Christmas
Reviews.Author: Nicole Chernick
Reviews.Content: And they loved it. Came packaged well for protection. They are fully enjoying the awesome pixels and the portability of the tablet.

Reviews.Title: Definitely the "most bang for your buck"
Reviews.Author: T. Clifton "Techie Tony"
Reviews.Content: What's not to like? This is probably the best piece of hardware out there for the price hands down. I have 2 iPads, iPhones, iMac. I love the Mac environment and iOS.  The hardware is obviously quite expensive, but if you use the device even 1-2 hours a day I would pay the extra and get the iPad. If you don't use the device regularly or if you're an Amazon-o-phile and your whole world revolves around Amazon, the Fire is the only logical alternative IMHO.  I prefer my iPad in almost every way, but I like the small size of the 7" to carry to town, mall, church or whatever instead of hauling around the iPad. It's an amazing price, and that's the best feature about this device.  I love the nice PPI resolution, which makes me feel right at home while reading.  The speakers are the next biggest stand-out feature that I really love about the HDX.  The first time I sat down to watch a movie on it, the sound literally blew me away!  It made the movie twice as interesting to hear the amazing surround sound or perhaps even 3-D sound if that's possible, awesome bass, great range, nice to hear it coming from both sides of the device when in landscape mode, all things I would expect from the more expensive iPad, but dont find! Also plenty of power if it's anywhere near close enough to see the screen.  I just have to gripe about the Amazon tweaks and control of the Android OS that just doesn't feel as customizable or as intuitive as plain old Android OS or obviously iOS.  Again for my purposes of mostly reading books, and the occasional movie, or browsing, this environment is actually just fine, but not my first choice, perhaps after using it long enough I'll learn to actually appreciate it, we'll see.  I wish it could be thinner and lighter of course, but I'd rather have the longer battery life that it does have vs. being lighter weight, with technology where its at right now.  I'm thankful for the wake sleep feature with the right case. I love that it has BT where a lot of cheap tablets in this price range tend to leave it out.  So far I've found all the Apps in the Amazon App Store that are important to me, so the App limitations haven't really bothered me yet. They seem to have a really good selection.  I do like not having to worry about bugs or viruses by only using Apps that are patrolled by Amazon, kind of like Apple does. It gives me a nice feeling of security.  Over-all, I can hardily recommend the HDX to anyone that doesn't use iTunes, or have an iPhone or Mac.  And to those looking to just get their feet wet in the tablet experience using it only occasionally. If you plan to really be using it a lot, I would instead highly recommend paying the extra money to get an iPad mini or Air, it's well worth the extra investment.  However this is a great starter tablet for kids or to just dabble yourself a little bit to see if tablets are really all they are cracked up to be!  I didn't get on the tablet bandwagon for almost 2 years, thinking they were just a passing fad, and were terribly limited compared to netbooks... well, after I saw they weren't going away after all, I got one, and I have never regretted it since! Good luck! There's a lot of good tablets out there to choose from. I've even found the cheapest Lenovo ones are pretty awesome.

Reviews.Title: I love it.
Reviews.Author: susie sherwood
Reviews.Content: At first I wasn't sure but after I got used to the difference between the old one and the new one I love it.

Reviews.Title: Love my Kindle Fire~!
Reviews.Author: Frances Zoller
Reviews.Content: Love how convenient it is to have so I can look things up so quickly!  I don't go anywhere without it!

Reviews.Title: Awesome...yet semi-invasive.
Reviews.Author: Ellery Higgins
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for my wife for Christmas this year.  My one major complaint with the device itself is that (at the time I purchased it) there was a difference of $50 to not have the "Special Offers" lock screen.  It sounds cool on their site to have it anyway...but....they're just advertisements on the lock screen that take up the whole page.  Soo...instead of microtransactions inside of an app to get rid of ads, you have to pay $50 more to not have these on your lock screen.  Not cool Amazon...not cool.EDIT: I purchased this on a Black Friday sale, to clarify, it is no longer $50 difference in the devices for the ad/non-ad ones, but at the time, one was on a large sale and the other wasn't...making it a large price difference.Second complaint which is also the awesomeness of this product.  With the purchase of the Kindle Fire, Kindle Fire HD, and the Kindle Fire HDX, you get free 500 coins for the app store after registering it and adding billing information.  I completed this...and 0 coins.  Soo....being curious, I used the "Mayday" button on there to contact support.  Due to the friendliness of the agent that responded, I found out I was only like the 10th person to use it that morning, as it's still a new feature, and the agents are new to this too!  She was EXTREMELY helpful and kind and informed me it could take a couple hours to receive this promotional credit.Last but not least...the power cable.  It is at a FUNKY angle on the tablet in order to keep with the contoured angle of the tablet edge.  It angles upward while plugged in properly.  If not careful, I can see this charging port or cable becoming damaged easily.Beyond those few issues, this is an excellent tablet, it's perfectly sized, fits well in the hand, the screen is bright (I see none of the blue tint as others are describing), and the support is phenomenal!

Reviews.Title: A Christmas Gift She Loves
Reviews.Author: Happy Camper
Reviews.Content: My wife already had a Kindle.  I cannot remember whether I bought it at a Brick and Mortar place or through the Wonderful World of Amazon(tm).  It was an older, very lightweight model, in black and white and all shades in between.  She needs lightweight because of severe Rheumatoid Arthritis.  Anyway, it was time for an upgrade.  Since I have the Kindle Fire HD 7", HD Display, Wi-Fi and love it, the fact that the HDX was lighter and did more was a selling point.Although she's not used it much at this point, everything is what she wants.  It does weigh a bit more than her original Kindle, but it's a con she's willing to live with.

Reviews.Title: A great tablet
Reviews.Author: Shaun Kanak
Reviews.Content: I finally bought my first tablet.  Since we are long-time Amazon Prime customers, I wanted a tablet that would play Amazon Prime video as well as Hulu+ and Netflix.  And, of course, a good Kindle experience.  That narrowed the field to either iPad or Kindle Fire.  After the Fire HDX came out it was clear that Amazon had some serious hardware.  The latest Kindle OS helped sell me too.I do miss the Google apps that I have on my droid phone but fortunately some of them can be side-loaded if you find the apk file on the web.Reading books and graphic novels is a great experience.Watching videos (both streaming and saved to the kindle) is great.Sound quality is very good.I'm still getting to know the Free Time feature for my young kids but it looks promising.Bottom line...if you like to read (on a tablet) and watch video then you will have a hard time beating the Fire HDX and when you consider the price, there's no contest.  I'm so happy with my 7" Fire HDX that I bought the 8.9" Fire HDX for my wife and kids.

Reviews.Title: Wish I knew more about Freetime before I bought
Reviews.Author: Mark Freeman
Reviews.Content: 1)  We bought this tablet after hearing great things about Freetime and the ability it gives you to limit exposure to your kids for content you don't want them to have access to.  However, we didn't know we couldn't let our kids access music while locked in freetime.  It has been a very trying couple of days while I have tried to find a work around.  From other reviews, I see that there were workarounds before, but Amazon has closed those off with it latest software release.  One of my daughters is very disappointed and I don't blame her.2)  The mayday button has come in handy for me already in the first couple of days of use.  They have been very quick to respond and other than not being able to help solve my music issue, they have been knowledgeable, polite, and very helpful.

Reviews.Title: Meets My Needs
Reviews.Author: W. Bradley
Reviews.Content: I bought this unit basically for three reasons: 1) a convenient portal for browsing in Amazon.com - I hate going to stores anymore and I find Amazon to be a convenient one-stop shop for most things I need and the Kindle does that very well which is what Amazon had in mind, 2) a convenient and quick way to browse various internet sites that I check regularly w/o having to fire up my laptop; 3) as an eBook/video/music platform that's extremely portable. I bought the Kindle because of all the above and the features were great too. The display was very good, the price was right and the on-demand help feature was nice too. For those buyers who have in mind of downloading a lot of games, etc. from the internet might want to look at another platform but if your needs mirror mine then the Kindle is hard to beat.

Reviews.Title: Not bad
Reviews.Author: Nathan Yardley
Reviews.Content: Awesome device just a little lacking in good apps from amazon. Sound and picture are quality though. A few more decent apps and it would be much better.

Reviews.Title: Buy this!
Reviews.Author: Theresa L. Lane "EnglishUnicorn"
Reviews.Content: We have a Google Chromecast and Iphones here. This works with our existing technology ecosystem. It recognized the Google Chromecast instantly. No issues with compatibility. Lots of aps. Excellent speed, streaming, OS runs faster than any Android or IOS I have seen. Very easy to use and great MAYDAY support on Christmas day. I did not and will not regret this purchase. We Chromecast Netflix off this as well as Pandora and several other apps. Sound on this thing is EPICLY AWESOME and LOUD. Amazon has officially won the tablet war. Ipad..it is time to lower your price to TRY to be competitive.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use, great with Amazon Prime
Reviews.Author: Eric Houser
Reviews.Content: Great to use with Amazon Prime.  Large amount of movies and TV shows to choose from for free.  Lending library is also cheap and convenient..

Reviews.Title: Great device
Reviews.Author: geoerl niles
Reviews.Content: Very clear, good connectivity. My wife really likes it! The apps are easy to find! And the movies are crystal clear

Reviews.Title: Best Kindle yet
Reviews.Author: Diane D
Reviews.Content: This is my 4th Kindle. I started with the 2nd generation. It was ok, but hard to read outside. Then I bought the Kindle Fire. Much better. But it broke after a couple of years. I bought my husband a Paper white, which he loves. BUT this HDX is great !  The picture quality is excellent. My grandson loves the Free Time so he can play his games and read books. I used the Mayday feature and was very impressed with the service. I like it because it is lighter than the original Kindle Fire too. Easy to navigate and search for things. I would highly recommend this to anyone. I LOVE IT !!!!!!

Reviews.Title: love it..
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer "ReadFreak"
Reviews.Content: Yes I got it today, so no real issues. It's my third kindle my fire HD is being passed on to another family member. It's still going strong. The light bleed which I was worried about due to other reviews is insignificant to me and usually LED lights bother me. So I'm glad this worked out. Unless I look for it I don't notice it. The browser is much faster and I'm happy with the set up of buttons and such. The mayday button is nice too for when you really can't figure something out. Overall I'm looking forward to this becoming my new favorite device. I didn't give 5 stars as I've only had it for about 4 hours ;)

Reviews.Title: AMAZING
Reviews.Author: Kyle Beck
Reviews.Content: Okay so this device is outstanding.  I am coming from the original kindle fire and it was well worth the upgrade.  The screen is amazing, very sharp, definitely as good if not better than the retina dispalay.  The sound is also very good.  The new interface is great.  It is really fast and fluid.  My only complaints are the location of the volume and power buttons, as well as the camera.  They are positioned in A way vest suited for holding the device landscape, while I would personally prefer them to be positioned in more of a portrait manner.  Another plus to the device is the Appstore has grown a lot since the first kindle fire.  It has most of the games that iOS has.  The only thing it lacks is a a program like word, excell, and PowerPoint.  Over all I would definitely recommend this device to anyone who likes an amazing display, a very decent battery life, great sound, a good Appstore, and a light sleek device.

Reviews.Title: Happy
Reviews.Author: Linda
Reviews.Content: My laptop died, with no hope of repair, the day after I ordered this Kindle.  So far, I'm not missing it.  I do find a stylus makes me more comfortable than poking about the screen with my clumsy fingers.  I also have a Kindle keyboard, which remains my favorite for lounging and reading.  Comparing the Fire HDX and the Kindle keyboard is a bit like the old apples and oranges comparison, though.  It's really, in my mind, comparing an ereader to a tablet.This Kindle is great fun, particularly if you enjoy streaming media and wandering around online.  It's an amazing amount of technology in a tiny package.

Reviews.Title: Another Win!
Reviews.Author: Buddy
Reviews.Content: Once again Amazon does a great job with the kindle. I bought this for my wife and in turn took her kindle fire the original. The graphics are amazing and it is really fast for the kids when playing games.  As always love Amazon and their products.

Reviews.Title: I love the new kindle fire hdx!
Reviews.Author: Arielle Taylor
Reviews.Content: Works beautifully. Feather light when compared with last year's model. I got the Mobile network with AT&T; which works fine.

Reviews.Title: Kindle's on Fire
Reviews.Author: Spencer Seiler
Reviews.Content: I love the Kindle Fire HDX! My previous Kindle Fire HD got shattered due to my own use, but the Kindle Fire HDX has many more features and looks fabulous. It's also notably lighter than the other 'Kindle Fire's. I'm very happy with this

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: jeg1946
Reviews.Content: I started using this when traveling a few days after receiving it.  I was traveling by train and their WiFi doesn't allow Netflix so I downloaded several episodes of a show I was watching.  I am very happy with it.  The pictures are clear, the sound is good and the set up and use is easy.  My husband and I are now sharing it as he is downloading books to read.

Reviews.Title: Great little tablet!
Reviews.Author: C
Reviews.Content: First off, I got started off as soon as I unpacked and turned it on. As soon as I logged in with my account all my kindle content synced up! I got the free trial so I had picked the kindle with the ads and I did not feel like the ads were bothersome at all. They mostly showed up when the tablet was in a 'sleep' status so I saw them when I was turning it back on. I even clicked on some out of curiosity since they are items I would be interested in. I did not add any extra apps so I just used what was already installed. It was a bit of a learning curve since I have been using an iPad but I was able to figure it out without much trouble. The browser is user friendly and the menus are not hard to use (once you figure out where the controls are). I mostly used it to watch movies and shows from amazon since I have Prime. I loved being able to take it around the house and not have a sore wrist! It is very light and the screen felt pretty hardy so i didn't worry about scratching the screen or the possibility of it dropping. The screen was crystal clear so I thoroughly enjoyed watching movies and shows on it ( the imdb inserts during shows and movies were a plus for me). I thought its size would be a disadvantage but it felt just like a regular size tablet. I liked that I could easily carry it in my handbag without feeling the extra weight or bulk! Battery life was decent. I was able to use it continuosly for at least 3 hours before it got critically low, although I noticed that even plugged to the wall it would somehow still be on and wouldn't be 100% charged? (could have been tks I wasn't physically turning it off during charge time) I assumed that maybe it was because ads popped up during this time. I had a hard time returning it but I wasn't quite ready to part with that amount of money right then. I still want to get one for sure!!!! So basically to sum it up, this tablet is a small, delightfully light, hardy, crystal clear, fast (in my opinion), and handy tablet. If you use Amazon a lot, it is a great tablet to have! I buy and rent e-books from Amazon, and have purchased most of my music from here too so, it was great to access all my content from it! I didn't think I would want one but after test driving it for a month now I really really do want to get one! I think it's a great little tablet!

Reviews.Title: SO FAR SO GOOD
Reviews.Author: Jordan "Jordan"
Reviews.Content: I received my new Kindle Fire HDX a couple of days ago. So far I've been very pleased with the device. The screen quality is great. The download time I found especially quick. The HDX is considerably lighter then the previous version.I recommend this tablet very much.

Reviews.Title: love it and great amazon service
Reviews.Author: ShopsLot
Reviews.Content: we own a few tablets in the home...to give reference ipad air and mini retina on verizon, wifi ipad 4, note 10.1 samsung and now this kindle hdx.I do have to mention that my first hdx arrived but something was wrong with battery life both charging and usage. also one long side of screen had too much blue shadow.  I almost returned it but decided to give replacement a try with the great customer service rep on phone with amazon.  The 2nd one arrived and battery life is great. with some minimal use over the past week, still at 40%...awesome! Also the blue shadow much less on replacement kindle as well.I do love Amazon and actually love the special offers myself on my kindle but you can opt out when purchasing.  I love the speaker volume on the hdx for such a little tablet more than sufficient.  beautiful screen, browser works well and smooth.  plenty of storage with 64gb version...downloaded 3 x Harry Potter in hd but not biggest hd file from amazon library with still plenty of room left.  great for trips out and content in purse to keep entertained.  no, amazon App Store is not as vast nor as lovely as iOS but main things I use are there....Facebook, candy crush, pulse, things of this nature. I now love my free book a month from kindle lending library. I have a young child in home so love the kindle free time for her books so she can't switch to 50 shades series on accident...yes!  great for skype calls, I heart radio, fitbit tracking and mainly reading kindle books. with this kindle hdx...I will not be buying a second mini ipad retina in the home.  almost wish I got the verizon version though. happy purchase with the $50 off special.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Big H
Reviews.Content: This is my first tablet and I love it. Very easy to set up and use right out of the box. And I got a good deal on it. I would definitely recommend this to every one I know. Great item I cant say enough about it.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Marcia
Reviews.Content: My friend has one and he gave it to me for about a week. I loved it! Reading books will never be the same. It has wi fi, facebook and all that so I don't even have to turn my PC on. It would've been even better if it had more apps to choose from. Otherwise it's a great buy and the price is right!

Reviews.Title: Awesome entertainment device that's light in your hands
Reviews.Author: Ckk
Reviews.Content: Screen quality is amazing even though it flickers at time. It's so light that you can have it in your hand for hours either reading or watching videos. Simple access to Amazon ecosystem to buy more things or more kindle books.

Reviews.Title: I love my kindle but,
Reviews.Author: webbrat
Reviews.Content: I like to read for 5 or 6 hours a night sometimes longer if I can't sleep and even if I place the kindle on "airplane mode" I don't get that much time on my battery.  I really worry for when I am traveling and can't get to a place to plug it in. I also worry because my connection where one has to plug it to recharge is getting sloppy.  I really have move the cord around to get it to charge and then hope the air currents don't change it.  This happens with both the cords I own.  This is also the 2nd hdx I've had.  This one is only 3 weeks old and now it is starting up with problems.  So while I love everything about my kindle (I don't even mind the ads) I am really in a spot with what to do now. This is also the reason for four stars.

Reviews.Title: amazing
Reviews.Author: tony solino
Reviews.Content: Theirs no other tablet on the market that can top this one.  If you buy this tablet it would be the best investment.

Reviews.Title: WOW Kindle HDX is great and so is the help!
Reviews.Author: Brian
Reviews.Content: This Kindle Fire HDX is great. The performance far exceeds my expectations and the screen clarity is SUPER. The help line is great. But, the people manning the help line need a little more training. They couldn't help on a few problems, minor as they were!That was ok for now but, what if something major comes up?Other than that it is a great little tool and were having a good time using it. It's handier than a lap top.

Reviews.Title: kindle review
Reviews.Author: Jan Murray
Reviews.Content: Very happy with my new kindle. It does everything my friends iPad does but at a much lower purchase price. Still learning all the different apps available.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX is just as good as an iPAD
Reviews.Author: Tonia Randolph
Reviews.Content: This is my 3rd kindle.  There are so many great things I can say about the Kindle Fire HDX.  The upgrades just only get better and I highly recommend anyone to purchase this especially if you are a work-play type person on the go like I am.  I love all the game, business, book, and etc apps.  Amazon has very good deals on their digital apps/books.  Just make sure you get the protection plan to protect your toy and make the best of all the uses that this wonderfully created device has to offer.  I will forever be a kindle fan.  The price is within my budget.  I love it.  Keep the modern technology of the kindle fire HDX coming!

Reviews.Title: Very happy with it
Reviews.Author: Eric
Reviews.Content: Exactly what I was looking for display is beautiful and book selection, app selection and movies are great, thanks Amazon!

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: James
Reviews.Content: Great Display.  Books looked great,  and is lightweight.  Price is wonderful, battery last a long time. Thank you very much.

Reviews.Title: Love it.
Reviews.Author: Audrey Green
Reviews.Content: What can  I say about this Kindle Fire HDX is just what I have been looking for.  Love it and the special offers don't bother me at all.

Reviews.Title: awesome little tablet
Reviews.Author: jonathan Fisk
Reviews.Content: This is a great tablet that does it all and for a phenominal price. Its not too big and cumbersome. Easy to carry and android apps galore. Anyone who is considering purchasing a tablet should seriously consider the kindle fire series.

Reviews.Title: kindle fire hdx is an awesome product.
Reviews.Author: Andrew Kramer
Reviews.Content: This tablet is perfect. It fast, crystal clear hd screen, and does everything I would want out of a tablet.

Reviews.Title: Definitely top tablet
Reviews.Author: israel perez
Reviews.Content: Great Product. Wish I could've kept it but will consider buying one in the near future. Keep up the good work

Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: Chres parker
Reviews.Content: Haven't had enough time with it yet but I' m pretty haapy with my HDX so far. I've noticed a few quirks, but it may be just me. Wish it came with iespell checker.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Bobio
Reviews.Content: I bought this because my Kindle Fire HD was refusing to function when there was still about 38% battery life left. The HDX is slimmer, lighter, and the operating system is more user-friendly. There are more pixels so the display is a lot clearer. I was surprised to find the sound quality of the HD is better than the HDX. But the battery life of the HDX is much better. Overall, I'm glad I bought the HDX.

Reviews.Title: Just the fastest period!!
Reviews.Author: obiken "obiken"
Reviews.Content: First of all if you are deciding what is the best tablet good luck, it depends on what you want it for. I owned the Apple mini with Retina, and I will again. However, if you are looking for the fastest WiFi, the best sound BY FAR, the best books, and movies, the Kindle Fire HDX is your huckleberry.You cannot beat the Apple for ease of use, or the apps. IF Kindle had access to all the Apple 3rd party apps, due to the price difference, it would be game over.However for Netflix, and internet browsing its not even close. KFHDX is way faster. So yes, sometimes the experts are right!!

Reviews.Title: Genius Amazon
Reviews.Author: FreedomAndLiberty
Reviews.Content: This product is just awesome. If you want the simple Amazon Prime tool to shop,watch,listen...or need help.. just click mayday....This product actually builds my desire to purchase more from Amazon. Also if i want to install google apps it is possible. Seriously Amazon Prime is just the way to go for all your shopping needs. So ..it has a fast enough processor to game and complete tasks like surf or watch a movie. Oh yeah another big thing was....reading books...this thing makes it easy to read a book....Amazon Prime and this device just works and is a huge solution for many tasks just reach down and pick it up...only thing that I would like to see is Kindles offer more harddrive space....like a 1tb...yeah we are in a time of file servers aka cloud servers...but in times of no internet...a real harddrive is a must...face it 4G/3G is a hoax, its a joke when it comes to internet so don't fall for the 4G lie and highway robbery mobile internet companies charge for internet...Amazon seriously this product and your growing services is on the right track for the future. Just remember don't close off this device to just Amazon...that would be the end of Kindle. I wish I had the money to have several of these devices....sometimes i don't need the full pc desktop but have a certain need and this device makes it possible and does so smoothly very good device very good tool. Keep up the good work Amazon! Amazon has so much potential that could grow alot of business and create alot of jobs....Kindle HDX is worth having! And my boy loves it! I recommend this especially if you are a Amazon user. I used this product for 20+ days or so and I'm getting one for Christmas. Battery life could be better but so could the ram and harddrive...but for what I did the device was not a problem it actually was the solution for many many tasks.  I watched movies, streamed music, watched video, surfed, read articles and books, used the alarm and calender, used yahoo weather app, played games. The only thing i noticed as something it lacked was harddrive space when the Amazon prime video offered to download the movie better quality would require more harddrive space. But this is more of need when traveling through an area where there would be no internet or limited internet. And... Really... the only thing...lacking is my bank roll to buy constantly 24/7 on Amazon with this device..haha...I'm sure i could come up with negatives but this device really is a solution a tool that just works for me.

Reviews.Title: Finally, Amazon got this mostly right!
Reviews.Author: A. Wertheim "werthla"
Reviews.Content: I have the Kindle HD, iPad, and Surface 2 just for background.I have a lot of problems with HD in terms of its claim to being a tablet - the internet is very fussy, it's slow and is simply not reliable as a tablet.  But it's a great E reader.I wanted a good 7 inch tablet.  I bought a returned the Google Nexus 7.  It was great except for no browser having a reading pane which is important in a small tablet.  You would think Google would have this in Chrome but no.  The screen is the best in class.I went to Best Buy and they had the HD and HDX side by side.  I compared the internet and there was no comparison - they HDX was very fast so I bought it to try out.  Happy to report that this is now a true tablet in that the Silk browser is much improved,, the quad core makes all the difference, the internet is now very usable and fast.HDX also has improvements over the HD - you can slide up from the bottom to access recently used programs which is very important if you need to switch between apps since only Surface allows you to keep two apps open simultaneously in the tablet world.  This works better than iPad.A page from other androids - you swipe down to see email and other notifications.The power button is now accessible!Size is smaller and slimmer.Some have noticed that there is a purple haze to the background.  That's true and that's something you have to judge for yourself if it bothers you.There is a limit on the number of tabs you can open on the Silk browser.Battery life is improved over HD.  It now comes with a cable and wall charger.There is no rear camera.  If that's important to you, consider the iPad Mini.  OR you can buy a real camera for the price difference.In summary, there is really no reason to buy the HD unless the price is $100.  The HDX is now a good competitive tablet.  The app store remains a problem if you depend on apps for games.  I have found some surprisingly good specialty apps.This is smaller than the iPad Mini and almost half the price.  Unless you are trapped in the Apple ecosystem and need their apps, (there isn't much you can't get from the web sites) this is a good alternative.

Reviews.Title: ABSOLUTELY fantastic
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I wish I had WiFi in my home, so I can enjoy it even more. Love May Day button- the people have really helped me a number of times. Don't understand why my book pages don't turn like the advertisement- someone needs to tell us why. Easy to download- great color and sound too. This is my 4th Kindle-- got to control myself on upgrades BUT the people I have given them to have enjoyed my spending!!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Karen M. Hooker "luv2read"
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle fire HDX, it's the perfect adult companion, I take it with me everywhere. It's fully equipped with games, books, movies and much more.It's easy to use and I have to hide it from my husband and two year old daughter who seem to use it more than me. It has a wide variety of free applications and the quality of the Hd screen is perfect for reading a nd viewing movies. It's never a dull moment with the Kindle Fire HDX,  I plan on purchasing two more so I can enjoy it without interruption. Lastly, the price is reasonable, can't be beat!!!

Reviews.Title: It's perfect for mom
Reviews.Author: Greg Shires
Reviews.Content: My mom loves her "basic" kindle.  I wanted to get her one that lights up and has access to internet, facebook, email, etc.  She loves it, so far she still just reads on it but I'm hoping she'll eventually use it for more.

Reviews.Title: The greatest 7" tablet for me!!
Reviews.Author: Morgan Ryker
Reviews.Content: When glancing around for tablets @ Peter Jones' dpt store (John Lewis) in London, the most appealing tablet I noticed was the Kindle Fire HDX 7. Since this tablet cannot yet be purchased in The Netherlands in a store, this was the only chance for me to pick it up and feel and explore it. I loved the design, the feel, the incredible clarity and mega-fast processor.Back home, I tested a lot of tablets at a Dutch local megastore. Google Nexus seemed appealing, then Samsung tab 3.0, but I disliked the shapes, too long/narrow screen proportions. LG Gpad 8.3 was another temptation, but again: that weird long narrow screen? I jumped on to Apple's Ipad Mini 2. Bigger screen than the average 7" and just perfectly proportioned. Simply not being an Apple's type of guy, I hesitated. What held me back at Ipad Mini 2, were the limitations of dropping audio and video files on it. You would have to use Itunes for almost everything and convert many movie files.With Kindle, I wasn't sure about its Amazon-tunnel-vision strategy. But I also read there were a lot of ways to sideload apps outside the Amazon app-convent.From the day I received it (3 days after purchase, this gets UPS delivered to your doorstep and yes, they do ask your neighbours to receive it on your behalf in case you're not at home), I have not regretted this purchase for one second.I like Amazon products a lot. I do read Kindle books. But I like Kobo also. No problem, on youtube there's a perfectly clear instruction video on how to bring Kobo to your Kindle, and the two do peacefully co-exist.Magazines: lovely, cheap and easy to order, a delight to page through on this tablet.PDF files, Word documents: perfect viewing.For more extensive typing, I purchased the Perixx Periboard-805L, which works like a charm as a bluetooth wireless foldable keyboard for my Kindle tablet.Kindle Fire HDX 7 had my first attention, and remained my ultimate choice. Best case to keep it protected in my opinion: Poetic Slimline. Thank you, Amazon! A very happy customer.

Reviews.Title: Very Good but not intuitive
Reviews.Author: RetiredDIY
Reviews.Content: I bought this because I wanted an e-reader that I could do more with then just read books.  So far I like it very much but find that it does not give great directions for how to use some of its features. I am still trying to discover HOW to sync documents, if I finally get it done I would give this item 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: WOW!
Reviews.Author: Susan J. Smith
Reviews.Content: My old Kindle is dying so ordered this one.  It is just incredible so far.  Very easy to set up and use.  The graphics are beautiful and the sound amazing!  I'm not too fond of the cover I ordered because it doesn't hold the stylus - bet that stylus will be lost in a day..lol

Reviews.Title: Mobile movie theatre .
Reviews.Author: alirich
Reviews.Content: The screen is sharper than my hdmi tv .The speaker sound is incredible for its size.I can watch movies and read anywhere and not bother anyone (when using head phones.)The 7 inch fire HDX is so light I can hold it like a book .Excellent wifi reception.Easy to use.I do admit that I watch most on netflix because cheaper and better selection.

Reviews.Title: Crashed constantly. I have lost all hope in Amazon hardware.
Reviews.Author: Sebastian "speelbergo"
Reviews.Content: I still have a Kindle Fire 1st Gen and have used it heavily for two years. I gave it one star because of the charging problems that Amazon wouldn't fix. Besides that and the occasional crash, I have gotten along with my old kindle pretty well since 2011.With the huge number of improvements that come with the Introduction of the HDX I decided to give Amazon tablets another chance.I returned it after one week's use.There were many very nice improvements to both hardware and software, but i'm not going to detail them because the fatal flaws completely overshadowed anything good I can possibly say about it.My Kindle HDX froze 3 times in two days. And when I say froze, i mean it became completely non-responsive for over an hour until i finally gave up and performed a hard reboot. All 3 times I was using the music player, which should be the easiest, most straightforward operation! I hate to part ways with Amazon because their hardware is so inexpensive but I guess you get what you pay for. I got my wife a two year-old USED iPad, and it has worked flawlessly for a year in our possession, never freezing or requiring a hard reboot.

Reviews.Title: Its a gig monster.
Reviews.Author: Chantell Harris
Reviews.Content: Seems to absorb a large amount of data due to programs running in the background. I had to delete my jetpack info from the system since it ate up 12gigs of data while in sleep mode.

Reviews.Title: This was a Birthday gift for my wife.
Reviews.Author: Bob Feil
Reviews.Content: Totally surprised her with it. She is constantly looking for books to read, now she just looks them up and she is all set. Skypeing our grand kids is a special treat as well,It's like having a lap top only smaller. Great product, would suggest this to friends and family.

Reviews.Title: Great picture
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Love my Kindle Fire HDX.  I kinda wish I bought the bigger one but i still love it.  I love that I can borrow a book.

Reviews.Title: An excellent device!
Reviews.Author: Al Carpenter
Reviews.Content: Purchased this to replace an earlier model Kindle Reader for my wife and, already, she loves it!  Bigger screen and easier to use than her smart phone, yet perfect size for her purse and, of course, much more sophisticated than the black and white reader.

Reviews.Title: love it so far
Reviews.Author: L. Hayes
Reviews.Content: I only got this today. The color is amazing!I did download some puff files I cannot find on the Adobe app but their in here somewhere. I'm sure I'll figure it out.Mobile files downloaded great. My books were on I n seconds that I'll had on a kindle app. It's not too heavy not extremely light either. Nice size as I have a tablet and a nook tablet. I like the size of this a lot better and the screen.It's just so bright and vivid. I really haven't used  it for anything else yet but I bet games are amazing.I definitely recommend. I have a HD tablet and this HDX blows the color away. Usage is easy and starts up easily not a lot of work.out of the box which I always dread.  Battery seems to hold well. I've been reading for about 4  hrs and it's half drained. If your considering buying just do it you won't regret it.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7" HDX 16GB
Reviews.Author: Lathanette Creasman
Reviews.Content: Ok I am not a techy person but like to keep up with what the new gadgets are. I never buy technical toys as I call them. Family has been trying to get me to get one of these for over a year. Well, I LOVE IT!!!! I got it because I am in a bookclub and everyone uses theirs to for their books and other avenues. I am still a paperbook fan but I love the Kindle Fire HDX. Best investment I have done since a laptop.

Reviews.Title: Bright and Light
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: The screen is truly fantastic but the first thing I noticed was how light the device was. It blows my mind how they can pack such technology in such a small package. I am very happy with this purchase and highly recommend it to anyone.

Reviews.Title: My favorite Kindle
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I love my newest Kindle.  This is very fast, very user friendly. I recently lost my laptop, but since I have been using this tablet, I won't replace the laptop.  I have a desktop computer when I want a keyboard, or a big screen for movies.  But, this tablet is fantastic for everything else, all the time, any time.  I check email, watch movies, read books, listen to music. LOVE IT!  I took it to school and let my 5th graders take turns using it for independent reading time.  It made reading so much fun for them. I also used a timer app in class as well.  The battery life is good on this tablet.  I use my other kindles, but this is my favorite one.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Oceansky
Reviews.Content: So far I am loving my Kidle Fire HDX.  It is fast on its downloads and I'm still playing with it to get to know all it's features.

Reviews.Title: my thoughts
Reviews.Author: lloyd l bolson
Reviews.Content: device seems to work fine.  I would have given it 5 stars if it had instructions.  Being new to amazon/android platform, I am still trying to get to work in a consistent fashion.

Reviews.Title: Great device!!
Reviews.Author: Melinda Roslin
Reviews.Content: This device is totally plug n play.  Easy to use, navigation is intuitive and it's large enough to read and play games, but small enough to put in my handbag.  I'm reading books again on a regular basis because of this device.  I love it!

Reviews.Title: This was a great purchase
Reviews.Author: Trudy McGuire
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love it.  The picture is great, I have to fight the kids to get a chance to use it.  Its small enough to bring with me every where I go.  I even bought each of my kids one of their own so I can use mine!

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Uhura
Reviews.Content: Very Handy, light weight and fits perfectly in my purse.  Sometimes myipad is too large,  the Kindle Fire HDX 7" is the perfect size.

Reviews.Title: Love my new tablet
Reviews.Author: footloose 321
Reviews.Content: It was so hard making a decison on a tablet. I bought the color nook years ago and thought I didn't need to upgrade. I coulnd't decide between the ipad mini and the fire hdx.  I chose the later and I love it. It is so clear and crisp.  I like all the free stuff amazon offers with it.  Great buy.

Reviews.Title: I really like it.
Reviews.Author: cw4ret@msn.com
Reviews.Content: Clear, sharp, and fast.  Only weakness might be short battery life and long charging times compared to other Kindle readers.

Reviews.Title: Nice product, seems like it's going to work out well for our needs
Reviews.Author: Bruce Lawson
Reviews.Content: Nice item fast shipping, seems like it's gonna work out well for our needs, may buy another one in the future

Reviews.Title: best tablet ever!
Reviews.Author: Bridget K Ament
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love the kindle fire. I always wanted a tablet and this one goes above and beyond my expectations!_

Reviews.Title: Best Tablet
Reviews.Author: Jason Mallett
Reviews.Content: Best tablet ever. The interface is beautiful. Screen resolution is great. Can't express how awesome this thing is. Love Prime too.

Reviews.Title: Love the new HDX - it
Reviews.Author: Steve
Reviews.Content: Works great, always nice to see an updated model.  Fast and super clear pictures.  Works exceptionally well with streaming videos.

Reviews.Title: loving it!!
Reviews.Author: Paula Renee Klepac
Reviews.Content: I really like this device!!!! I am an Apple girl but this little device has got me inspired to try other things!!!!

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Debra Alexander
Reviews.Content: I got my Kindle Fire & inch" HDX an so far I love it took me a while to learn how to set up certain applications I wanted on it but I was really disappointed that it didn't come with a paper book instead of having to go on my computer to find out how to set up youtube and other programs

Reviews.Title: Top choice
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth
Reviews.Content: I think this Kinfle is great.  It does everything a tablet should do and you can carry your books with you.

Reviews.Title: Almost 5 Stars
Reviews.Author: T. Monk-Shadee
Reviews.Content: The HDX is just what I wanted! Would be 5 stars if there were a more interesting  and diverse selection of apps.

Reviews.Title: love!
Reviews.Author: mandolin
Reviews.Content: I LOVE MY NEW KINDLE! so glad i didn't spend the extra money on an ipad. this is perfect for me in every way, especially when it comes to reading.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!!!
Reviews.Author: twinmom42
Reviews.Content: I just got my Kindle Fire DX and I have to say that it is awesome!!  Some people have complained about a blue haze and it is there but barely noticeable.  I do a lot of reading and have it set to the beige background and it is perfect.  The screen has barely any glare and it is extremely lightweight.  For the money you can't beat it.

Reviews.Title: Get one now
Reviews.Author: Raven Turner
Reviews.Content: This is my first ever tablet and I love love love it. I can do pretty much everything with this and it's super fast. I love the camera on this. I brought this when it was on sale for $179 and I'm writing this review with my kindle

Reviews.Title: Awesome First Tablet.
Reviews.Author: Agente-004
Reviews.Content: My first tablet and I find that this is all I need. Since I am trying to do away with traveling with a laptop I chose this tablet with enough hard disk space for me to have movies and a few apps to keep me entertained throughout my travels wherever I may be,

Reviews.Title: SWEET
Reviews.Author: KBroadhead
Reviews.Content: This was a purchase for my daughter. Not only did it arrive quickly (thanks to Prime), it was easy to setup and get her books downloaded.

Reviews.Title: Nice addition
Reviews.Author: Harrison
Reviews.Content: This was an early Christmas present and I'm happy I bought it.  It's used every day and performs well.  The screen and sound are amazing.  Tons of apps.  Just wish there were some other features like the ability to change wallpapers or have access to the Google Play store. There are apps that I've purchased on the Play store that I would have to repurchase if I want them on the Kindle even though they are the same app. The Mayday feature is nice to have, I've used it once and saved me from doing the research.  Nice addition that I didn't think I would use as much as I do.

Reviews.Title: Sweetheart loves it!
Reviews.Author: Daniel Lavan
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my sweetheart and she now can get many hours of enjoyment from it!She loves it and all she can do with it!

Reviews.Title: Nice, but does not hold a charge long enough
Reviews.Author: Happylark
Reviews.Content: I have enjoyed owning the new Kindle Fire for its speed and beautiful display.  My only issue is that it does not hold a charge for long, even in sleep mode.  I have found that in sleep mode, the new Fire HDX can quickly drain the battery.  Amazon should review this problem a fix it for the next version.

Reviews.Title: hdx review
Reviews.Author: vg
Reviews.Content: after 2 months of deciding between the hdx and nexus 7 i went with the hdx and could not be happier.its everything amazon claims it to be.great purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great Hardware, Horrible App store!
Reviews.Author: Christopher Shively
Reviews.Content: Hardware is great! Very light, great screen, good battery life. OS & Web browser is good. App store is awful!!!!!!!!!! If you get this tablet with plans to use it to entertain your child(ren) Disney or Disney JR apps are not available in the app store. No Google Chromecast. The child or toddler apps I did download would freeze, not only the app but also the tablet! Also they would have annoying advertisements in the middle of use of the app and the "X" to close the ad would never be in one place. So my 3 year old son would hand me the tablet every time an ad came up so I could close it for him. This got pretty annoying! After a few days of using it, I just found myself not happy with it. I decide to reluctantly returned it. This device has so much promise. All it needs is a suitable app store. I guess I'm going to pay $200 more for and Ipad which I didn't want to do in the first place. Amazon you need to fix your App store

Reviews.Title: Great Small Tablet; Love It!
Reviews.Author: Music fan
Reviews.Content: I have the original Kindle Fire which I have really enjoyed.  Also have a full-size iPad which is a great size for watching movies in bed, but really too big/heavy to play games.  The original Kindle Fire has only 8 GB storage (partly taken up by software) so I wanted another smaller tablet.  It was between the new Kindle HDX or the new iPad mini.  One thing I didn't like about the iPad mini (besides the price tag) is that the bezzle on the long sides is so narrow, it is hard to hold the device without getting your thumb on the display (which screws up games).  When I saw the HDX on sale on Cyber Monday, I grabbed it.It's fast, thin, light and easy to hold for long periods of time.  I can't believe how light it is compared to my KFire! There are several design changes, such as the ability to show the percentage the battery is charged in the little icon in the top right corner. You have to swipe down from the top of the display to access settings and other utilities.  I got the 32 GB version, so there is plenty of room for games and other apps.  I did download a Prime Instant Video to watch off-line, but I don't like the small display for watching movies.About that display -- I compared the HDX to the original Fire, looking at the same page of a book that has alot of white space on it.  White is a color, and like all colors, it can be "warm" or "cool."  A cool white is "bluish", and a warm white will be a little yellowish.  When I compared the 2 kindle displays for a book, I was shocked to see something I never noticed before.  On the original Fire, the white is "cool/bluish" and there is yellowish tint seeping in around the edges of the pages of the book I was comparing!  This never bothered  me; as I said, I never noticed it.  On the new HDX, the opposite is true --  the color white is warm (yellowish) with the blue/purple (that so many have commented about) seeping in around the edges of the book.  I doubt that this will bother me, and I feel that the people who complained about this and sent back this beautiful little device because of it, need to get a life!  BTW, the page on the HDX doesn't look yellowish to me at all; it is only when compared side-by-side to the original Fire that you can detect the different tints to the white color.I love playing games on the HDX, as even fast running games (such as my favorite Temple Run 2) work without stalling.  And, I got Temple Run Oz (finally) which was not compatible with the original Fire.There are some design features I don't like, such as the way the charger sticks in at an angle.  But charging is very fast using the included charger. My only real issue now is the battery life.  I am currently charging it up, and I am going to see if I can get anything close to 10 hours of "mixed use" on it.  (Yes, there are ways to extend battery life, such as turning off wifi when not using it.  Search on the internet for other tips.)Edit about battery life:  I usually find that when products are advertised as "up to X hours on a single battery charge (depending on settings, usage, blah blah blah)"  I usually get half that. What concerned me about the HDX was that I had fallen asleep with the HDX unplugged, watching a PREVIOUSLY DOWNLOADED movie (a 2.5 hour movie downloaded in "better" quality; after it finished, the display went into sleep mode)-- the next morning, the battery was showing only 35% charged from fully charged the night before.  Since many people posting on the forums with battery problems were told to do a "hard reboot"  I tried that then fully charged the battery again (luckily, charging is pretty quick.)  Downloading music, and letting the display go to sleep mode, the HDX lost only about 10% per hour.  But as soon as I picked it up and played some games for a little while (like Temple Run 2) the battery much more rapidly depleted (this is with wifi turned on, as music was simultaneously downloading).  Then I recharged it, and again tested that same 2.5 hour previously downloaded movie -- with wifi turned off, "airplane mode" turned on, and brightness set at about 70%, the battery drained from fully charged to 65%. So, finally, I downloaded a 2 hour SD quality movie to my HDX, and going from fully charged, with wifi off, and brightness lowered to about 50%, the battery went to 88%, losing only 12%.  Yes, a big improvement over my original KFire which lost double that, 25%, under the same conditions.When I got my HDX it was about 70% charged.  Looking in the settings, I saw that the software was up-to-date.  I was able to download content, read, and play games, without the HDX turning itself off and rebooting (as many have complained of).  The next morning, I saw a notification that there had been a software update -- one thing that was changed is that you can now put apps and books into "collections."  Not only that, but apparently my HDX "synced" wirelessly with my iPad Kindle reading app, where I had already put some books into collections.  Those same books now appear in collections on my HDX without my doing anything. Thank you Amazon.I give this 5 stars, certainly in comparison to the original Kindle Fire.  In general, this HDX is spectacular and the price is great.

Reviews.Title: bargain despite the blue
Reviews.Author: Marcus L. Weiss
Reviews.Content: Must first acknowledge the 'blue thing...'  Yes--blue borders.  I have grown to find them perfectly fine.  It is just a slight blue haze at the borders--when displaying white--of the screen.  I got used to them very quickly and now actually kind of like them when I (rarely) notice them at all.  If you must read with a white background (sepia or black is easier on the eyes in any case) then this might not be the machine for you.  But for everyone else--where you gonna go?  Every single tablet has some issue--the nexus 7 has little power, the big ipad is overpriced, the little one is both overpriced and under-powered, the big hdx is much less capable as it has the same power components but needs to display all that extra space.If you can deal with the 'blue thing' and get around the 'mojito' by well circulated means--this thing is a wonderful bargain.  Sound, power, silly-pretty display, feel...and did I mention power???

Reviews.Title: Is it worth it to upgrade from Kindle Fire to Kindle Fire HDX?
Reviews.Author: RusselCornelson
Reviews.Content: I figured I would make this an ongoing review.DAY ONE - ObservationsPACKAGING: was appropriately sized;  the kindle was well protected and had no noticeable defects/scratches or damage in transit.  The kindle came to me holding a charge so I could instantaneously turn it on and play with it.  Brownie point #1SIZE: It is significantly lighter than my original fire,  and the tapered edges make it feel quite thin.  Not a fan of the tapered edges at this point,  seems slippery like I am going to drop it.  Might just be the way I hold it ..CHARGER:  I am not a fan of the charger port location;  due to the tapered edges ... the mini-USB plug goes in on a weird angle.  Can't just hold the thing flat and push it in ... I can see I will need to be very careful when plugging it in.SCREEN:  Turning on the HDX ... had a instant WOW factor.  The screen is so much better than my original fire it is almost ridiculous to compare the two.  Very crisp, clear picture and ...TOUCH RESPONSE:  I am sure it's due to the power behind it (CPU) that the responsiveness of the touch screen and smooth scrolling are also massive improvements over my original kindle.SETUP:  It took no time at all to setup;  it linked all my old books and apps automatically.  It was seemless .. my old kindle was still warm sitting beside me and I already had this one up and running with all my usual apps on it. Well done AmazonBROWSING SPEED:  One of the most improved aspects I notice is how fast the browsing of the web is.  This is something I used to not use on my original kindle ... If I had to goto a webpage I pulled out the laptop, not anymore .. the HDX is very responsive and fast,  I may argue it's faster than my viao with an i7 processor and 8Gb ram ... well at least when it comes to Browsing the web.FIRST NIGHT READING EXPERIENCE:  I found an auto brightness setting which is awesome;  lights go out, screen dims automatically.I'll update more after I get to play with it more.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I have this unit for several weeks now and since then I have experienced a couple of slow down response and three "blue screens" although the unit is 40%, 80 % and 55 % charged, the first time it came back after 4 hours, the second and third time after several minutes. I have the older Kindle Fire for quite a while now and did not experience anything like these from the older unit.

Reviews.Title: I Love the HDX Kindle!!!!
Reviews.Author: plopez
Reviews.Content: Love it! It's lighter faster & clearer!  This post has to be thirteen words but this is all I have to say!

Reviews.Title: Great For Reading in Bed!
Reviews.Author: Homer B. Brown Jr.
Reviews.Content: Fast response, beautiful, sharp picture,  great for reading at night without additional lights.  Use it primarily for reading books and very happy with it.

Reviews.Title: 10/10 would buy again
Reviews.Author: Antonio
Reviews.Content: Extremely fast, a joy to hold, long battery life (with careful use), with a decent office suite available. What's not to love?

Reviews.Title: Better than fire.  A caveman might disagree.
Reviews.Author: Christian Burnett
Reviews.Content: Got this for my girlfriend as a birthday present to replace her Kindle Fire HD.  She loves the lighter weight, brighter, clearer screen, and speed.

Reviews.Title: amazing
Reviews.Author: duchess62146
Reviews.Content: As a longtime Kindle user it was time to upgrade again. From my first Kindle with the sd card to the HDX, I have never been disappointed. I am 67 years young and am constantly amazed at the advances in technology. Keep up the good work.

Reviews.Title: Great graphics & picture quality in a small package !
Reviews.Author: lparsh
Reviews.Content: Great graphics & picture quality, both pictures & videos are really great!  The only negative is in the battery drain.  It's not really a problem, but I was expecting the time to recharge to be more than 7-8 hours during high use.  Otherwise I would highly recommend the Kindle Fire HDX model. Happy with the speed & storage space as well (I have the 32 GB model).

Reviews.Title: Outstanding picture quality at a very reasonable price
Reviews.Author: Mats
Reviews.Content: Absolutely perfect for video. We mostly watch HBOGO and Netflix, great picture quality at a very reasonable price. Haven't had a reason to try Mayday yet.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7" 32 GB
Reviews.Author: susan k. meeker
Reviews.Content: Love it. It does everything I expected and more. Very happy with the addition of Mayday. People are great to talk with and are always there to help no matter the question.

Reviews.Title: You won't be disappointed!
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: This is my second kindle and I love it!  I am an avid reader and use it for email access as well.  The screen is crystal clear and it is very responsive.  I am not a techie but setup was a cinch!  My only disappointment that is worth mentioning is that the screen is difficult to read in the Florida sun.  I still gave it a 5 star rating and will use my "older" black/white kindle when I am relaxing by the pool.

Reviews.Title: A beauty .... This Kindle Fire is my sidekick! ... Love it!
Reviews.Author: RockPoppy
Reviews.Content: Hands down the best tablet for the money. The picture is amazing! I've already read three books on this device and it's a beauty. I get a lot of compliments. Very happy!Update - I've been using this Kindle Fire quite a bit the last few days and have experimented with the services of Amazon such as their Amazon Cloud importer which allowed me to upload and use all my Apple iTunes music on my Kindle Fire. The sound coming out of my headphones sounds amazing coming from the Kindle Fire. The X-Ray feature plays the lyrics as the songs play.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful product.
Reviews.Author: Tayoftheice
Reviews.Content: This kindle is amazing. Very sharp colors, wonderful design. I do see what people mean about the blue border around the text, but it's not all that bad and it doesn't detract from reading experience.

Reviews.Title: One of my best purchases from Amazon!
Reviews.Author: metsgirl61
Reviews.Content: I am so happy with my purchase. So many apps to choose from and free Kindle books for the whole family to choose from. I am still learning how to use it with the help from my son :)

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Ericka M.
Reviews.Content: I love the kindle fire! It's very sleek and user friendly, also it's super fast! I recommend it to all!

Reviews.Title: Absolutely Great!!!
Reviews.Author: Shalonda
Reviews.Content: OMG!!!  I love this new kindle.  I know I've probably said this about every new kindle they come out with.  But they just keep getting better, and better.  This kindle is slimmer, and the screen is so much sharper.  I love the fact that it actually updates itself.  I also enjoy having all my apps just under the carasel.  I don't have to keep going back and forth between the home page and the "apps" menu.  Keep it up Amazon your doing a WONDERFUL job.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy
Reviews.Author: Richard Eller
Reviews.Content: This probably is the best deal out there. It's the perfect size to be really something you can slip in your pocket or with a nice protective cover take along with you since it's smaller than a paperback. The display is awesome! The images are just like being there. The sound is great, but I wish there was a little more volume on the hi side. I got the 32GB with WI-FI only and all I can say is the competition really needs to look at what you can achieve for an economical price. I like how it automatically updates the software without having to search for it, and MAYDAY is just one of the most fantastic features, no one has anything like this. I had just bought a e-ink reader about three weeks before buying the Kindle Fire. All I can say, is, it's worth every penny!

Reviews.Title: Great for wireless display!

Reviews.Content: Great little device for the price. Works perfectly for watching amazon videos on TV (in conjunction with my Netgear PTV3000)

Reviews.Title: Wonderful item
Reviews.Author: GENE
Reviews.Content: This is a wonderful item. I have only scratched the surface of using it. The help button is ideal when I get stuck on something. Amazon has a winner here.

Reviews.Title: Gift for brother
Reviews.Author: Sebastian Perez
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for my brother. He loves to read. He love the easy way you can buy books to read.

Reviews.Title: I would recommend the Kindle fire HDX
Reviews.Author: austin gabhart
Reviews.Content: My Kindle fire is awesome ,picture is crisp and clear, I have watched movies on it and stereo sound is unbelievable. My wife bought an iPad and my Kindle fire HDX has a much better display , it has a ,quad core processor it's very quick on the Internet, playing games .. It does have one fault it only has a front facing camera, other than that if you're looking for a lightweight very fast excellent display tablet you can't go wrong with this

Reviews.Title: mayday is great

Reviews.Content: The Kindle fire HDX is better than my old kindle fire. I like the Mayday button the advisor helped me turn off the screen reader feature. When I turned it on by mistake.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX Is Awesome
Reviews.Author: Prairie
Reviews.Content: This is my first experience with the Kindle Fire and I was really surprised how much I can do with it. I thought Kindle's were just for reading books or playing games but it is so much more than that.

Reviews.Title: i love it.
Reviews.Author: lindsay
Reviews.Content: i love this tablet. the mayday button is a great thing for a Luddite. i still have not figured out all the bellsand whistles but i like what i have so far.

Reviews.Title: Another step of improvement
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: This is the third Kindle and second Kindle Fire I have owned.  The HDX is even sharper than the HD is.

Reviews.Title: Great machine, enable Hulu with the Silk browser.
Reviews.Author: lancebenton
Reviews.Content: Great machine.  I bought this and my wife has a Kindle Fire HD.  We also subscribe to Amazon Prime.  My squawk is that the Silk browser does not work with Hulu (previews only) and they want you to subscribe to Hulu plus.  Amazon prime offers lots of great free streaming programs but for Hulu programming I have to go back to my laptop and just use the regular web browser to go to Hulu.com  Maybe enable Hulu if you subscribe to Amazon Prime?  r/LOB

Reviews.Author: Goldfinger
Reviews.Content: love my Kindle, the picture quality is great; however the internet is not the greatest. I did not buy it for the internet so I would have to say I am very pleased with my Kindle.

Reviews.Title: I enjoy the enhancements, with a few exceptions
Reviews.Author: markh
Reviews.Content: I like the display, memory and speed.While reading and charging the usb cable must come out of the top. Add on the origami stand and I can not open it like a book (right to left).Since yesterday's update the device rebooted 2 or 3 times in 10 minutes while reading.This also places the light sensor were my hand swipe hovers causing backlight to dim.The volume does not APPEAR as loud as the fire hd-7.The battery life is definitely 10-20% shorter than the fire hd-7.Looking forward to loading it up with prime videos offline...8D

Reviews.Title: This is great, perfect for the traveler...
Reviews.Author: Bonnie J. Seagroves
Reviews.Content: This is a GREAT tablet!  I had been debating whether to purchase something like this for years.  I am not someone who goes out and buys the latest and greatest- I keep things until they no longer work.  Last year I purchased a Kindle fire for my granddaughter who is 9, and I had the chance to use it a couple of times... This one has better picture and better sound.  It is a basic model- perfect for the person who travels and needs to check email, read, play games, and watch movies/listen to music.  I am in love with this and will keep it until it dies, just like my disc walkman!

Reviews.Title: Fantastic Colors and Great Book Reader and E mail Function
Reviews.Author: dennis
Reviews.Content: I purchased for my wife, who at 69, is not a wiz and computers, no matter how long I teach her how to use it.  She did learn to sort of master the Kindle keyboard...(how hard is it to push a button to turn a page?), but could never learn how to remove the books she read from the reader (backspace)!But, she loves her new Kindle fire: the color, the finger motions, all seem to make intuitive sense to her, so the calls for help are few and far between.  The next step is for her do e mail on it and considering the issues she has had with both lap top and smaller pc; we will see.  I tried it and it is very simple and works well.  She is a single finger type artist, so the lack of physical keyboard will not be an issue.She is primarily a book reader and she loves seeing the book cover!

Reviews.Title: It's great! Fast!
Reviews.Author: C.M.
Reviews.Content: I bought this for myself as a B-Day gift and Love it! The only reason it received 4 stars is due to a kinda shorter battery life. (That is because an I pad charge lasts forever).

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7"
Reviews.Author: Phyllis Osback
Reviews.Content: I LOVE everything about it; except, the screen is very sensitive. Also, It turns and then I have to move it a lot to get it back to the way I want it.  I LOVE, LOVE, LOVE "May Day".  I originally purchased the new Nexus 7 2013 and was not happy with it at all.  I returned it and purchased the Kindle Fire HDX 7".
